verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G4921>commend<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5402>Phebe<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G79>sister,<s%> which <S%G5607>is<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>at<s%> Cenchrea: <S%G2747><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G4327>receive<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> as <S%G516>becometh<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that ye <S%G3936>assist<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whatsoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4229>business<s%> she hath <S%G5535>need<s%> of <S%G5216>you:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3778>she<s%> <S%G2532>hath<s%> <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G4368>succorer<s%> of <S%G4183>many,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1700>of<s%> <S%G848>myself<s%> also.

Who <S%G3748><s%> have <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> laid <S%G5294>down<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5137>necks:<s%> unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

Likewise <S%G2532><s%> greet <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%> <S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>well-beloved<s%> <S%G1866>Epaenetus,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> <S%G2267>Herodion<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4773>kinsman.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that be <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> household of <S%G3488>Narcissus,<s%> which <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G4648>mark<s%> them which <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G1370>divisions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4625>offenses<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G3129>learned;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1578>avoid<s%> <S%G575><s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they that are <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2836>belly;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> good <S%G5542>words<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fair <S%G2129>speeches<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G172>simple.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> is come <S%G864>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men. I am <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> on your <S%G1909>behalf:<s%> <S%G5213><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> yet I <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1511>wise<s%> <S%G4680><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> that which is <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G185>simple<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G2556>evil.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that is of <S%G1410>power<s%> to <S%G4741>establish<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> which was kept <S%G4601>secret<s%> since the world <S%G5550>began,<s%> <S%G166><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is made <S%G5319>manifest,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> of the <S%G4397>prophets,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> made <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of faith: <S%G4102><s%>
